climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Ergonomic Shape: Drop-like pillow shape perfect fit the curve of feet arch, promote the feet blood circulation. Super comfortable by high density memory foam material.
Under-Desk Pillow: Ideal foot support pillow for office worker, game player, and students who sitting for all-day. Provide great support to relieve legs and feet pain through raising your feet.

Pain Relief: If you suffer from chronic back or leg pain from sitting too long, this footrest pillow can save you. Adjust the height to improves sitting posture, which reduce the physical burden of sitting for long time.

Multi-Functional: Not only used as the traditional footrest under desk, but also may be used under the knee on a bed or sofa to provide extra support for lower back pain while lying down or sleeping. Flip it over and it turns into a rocking pedal to help you relax and relieve stress.

Universal Gift: A surprise gift for people who sitting and working for long time. Effectively solve their pain and fatigue problems. Perfect for family and officemate when choosing a holiday or birthday gift. A universal gift choice when you do not know what to give.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Drop-Shaped Design Smooth water drop shape design, both beautiful and practical. Designed ergonomically, providing perfect support in multiple directions and angles. Effectively relieve legs and feet fatigue. Anti-Slip Bottom The bottom is inlaid with silicone round beads, providing enough friction to effectively prevent sliding. Soft silicone material will not cause damage to the floor. When using the footrest in turn, it can also massage the feet and promote blood circulation. Memory Foam Made of high-density memory foam which is soft and comfortable with sufficient support. After a long time of use, it can quickly bounce back and keep its original shape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Step Up Your Comfort Game!
reviews.reviewText: After using the StepLively foot rest, I can confidently say that it has made a significant impact on my overall comfort and well-being while working long hours. This ergonomic footrest is designed to provide fatigue and pain relief, and it has lived up to its promise.The memory foam construction of the footrest is an excellent feature, as it conforms to the natural shape of my feet, providing customized support. This has been particularly helpful in reducing pressure on my legs and lower back, allowing me to maintain a better posture throughout the day. As a person suffering from sciatica, this is such a godsend!The non-slip bead on the base of the footrest ensures that it stays in place even when I need to adjust my position. This has been a valuable addition, as it eliminates the need to constantly reposition the footrest, ensuring that it is always where I need it to be.The washable cover is another thoughtful feature of the StepLively foot rest. Not only does it maintain a clean and professional appearance, but it also allows me to keep the footrest hygienic with ease. The black color of the cover makes it versatile enough to fit in any office, home, or gaming environment.One aspect to consider is that the footrest may not be suitable for those with larger feet, as its size could be limiting for some users. However, for the majority of users, the size should be more than adequate.In conclusion, the StepLively foot rest has been an excellent addition to my workspace, providing comfort, pain relief, and support during long workdays. The memory foam, non-slip bead, and washable cover are practical features that make this footrest a valuable investment. Whether you're working from home, in an office, or enjoying gaming sessions, this footrest is a great option for improving your overall experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ultimate Comfort and Convenience
reviews.reviewText: The Foot Rest for Under Desk has been a fantastic addition to my workspace. What I love most about it is that there's absolutely no installation required – you simply place it under your desk, and it's ready to use. The memory foam cushioning provides exceptional comfort and support for my feet, reducing fatigue during long work hours.One thing that pleasantly surprised me was how it came to shape after letting it sit for a day. It transformed into the perfect ergonomic footrest, custom-fitted to my needs. It's a simple yet effective solution for anyone looking to improve their workspace comfort. I highly recommend the Foot Rest for Under Desk!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice little foot rest
reviews.reviewText: The foot rest is soft and cushiony and nice to place your feet on. My only quibble is it's a little too low for me - I would prefer a foot rest with a bit more height. But comfort-wise, it's very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect. Give it time to
reviews.reviewText: Was really skeptical at first with some of the mixed reviews, but was only a matter of allowing the product some time outside of its original packaging to transform into its actual shape. It’s packaged tightly so of course it needs time to fluff up, and once it does, it’s just like the picture. The foam is super soft & the anti-slip bottom is great. For the price, it’s worth it. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Supports better seated posture
reviews.reviewText: UPDATING TO ADD: I ordered the wider version because of how antsy I am when seated, and it's perfect! As noted in my original review, nothing wrong with the narrower version, it just turns out I move around a bit more and the wider version works better for me. All other positive attributes noted below still apply to the wider version.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Because I am short, I *just* barely can't touch the floor while seated in my desk chair, leading to all kinds of posture issues and achey knees/hips/back.Now, I can comfortably rest my feet securely on this foot rest, which makes a huge difference for my comfort while seated.I work from home, so I also get to use this without shoes, and the biggest surprise is how delightfully comfy this rest is to dig my toes into throughout the day! I find myself stretching my feet and ankles throughout the day more, and it feels really good.Only downside is not the fault of the foot rest: I am apparently a physically restless person, and find myself moving around enough that I wish I'd bought the wider version (so I wouldn't have to keep moving the foot rest around to keep up with my restlessness).For me, the foot rest stays where I put it, it's comfortable, and it's easy to adjust under my desk throughout the day.I'm honestly baffled that it took me this long to realize how useful a foot rest would be!I think some reviews note an odor right when the package is unsealed (mine came verrrrry vacuum sealed), and I did too right when I opened it; I chalked it up to just what foam normally smells like, and I didn't find it objectionable. Anyway, after letting the foam expand from being compressed and airing out for a day, I do not detect any residual odor, and the size and shape are exactly as shown in the images.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft on your feet, weird texture with socks
reviews.reviewText: Put it under my desk to provide some foot support and occasionally switch leg position as sitting in the normal 90-degree angle can get tiresome. It is wrapped in a vacuum-sealed package to save space and expands upon opening. I was disappointed with the height as I thought the footrest would be slightly higher. However, over time I got used to it and I come to use it everyday at my home desks. It takes a lot of strain off putting your feet flat on the ground. Additionally, the sensation with socks on is quite weird so I usually go rest my bare feet on the pillow or wear sandals on the top of it. I think it is quite reasonable for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feet love this!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is soft and squishy but firm so it still offers support. Of course the material will collect hair.. I’ll just use a lint roller when it gets bad enough. So happy I got it for my remote desk job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than Expected
reviews.reviewText: The size was smaller than expected. It is also more for carpeted or soft surface areas. I purchased it for work, but it does not work on hard surfaces and gets dirty easily. I use it in my office at home on carpeted floors and I enjoy it on those surface areas.
